DocBlocksToJson.name: DocBlocksToJson
description: This compiler reads doc blocks and converts them to parsable JSON.
A property to hold the final result of the compilation.
properties.name: parsed

description:
A property to hold the name of the current file being parsed. This property
only exists for debugging purposes. This class has logging to make it
easier for Drash developers and users to find errors during compilation.
properties.name: current_file

description:
Compile a JSON array containing classes, properties, and methods from the
specified files by parsing the doc blocks of each file.
methods.name: compile

description: The array of files containing doc blocks to parse.
params.name: files

description: Returns the JSON array.

Get the specified `@annotationname` definitions from the specified doc
block.
methods.signature: public getDocBlockAnnotationBlocks(annotation: string, docBlock: string): any[]
methods.name: getDocBlockAnnotationBlocks

description: The annotation to get in the following format: `@annotationname`.
params.name: annotation

description: The docBlock to get the `@annotationname` definitions from.
params.name: docBlock

description: Returns an array of data related to the specified annotation.

Parse the specified array of method doc blocks and return an array of
method-related data.
methods.name: getClassMethods

description: The array of doc blocks to parse.
params.name: docBlocks

description: Returns an array of method-related data.
Parse the specified class doc block.
methods.name: getClassDocBlock

description: The array of doc blocks to parse.
params.name: docBlocks

description: Returns an array of property-related data.

Parse the specified array of property doc blocks and return an array of
property-related data.
methods.name: getClassProperties

description: The array of doc blocks to parse.
params.name: docBlocks

description: Returns an array of property-related data.

Get the common doc block data between a class' property doc blocks and
method doc blocks.
methods.name: getClassCommonData

description: The doc block in question.
params.name: docBlock

description: Returns an access modifier, description, and signature.
Get the `@annotationname` line.
methods.signature: protected getDocBlockAnnotationLine(annotation: string, docBlock: string): any
methods.name: getDocBlockAnnotationLine

description: The annotation to get from the doc block.
params.name: annotation

description: The doc block to get the `@annotationname` definitions from.
params.name: docBlock

description: Returns an object containing the annotation lines data.
Get the description of the specified doc block.
methods.name: getDocBlockDescription

description: The doc block in question.
params.name: docblock

description: Returns an array of descriptions.
Get paragraphs from a text block.
methods.name: getParagraphs

description: The text block containing the paragraph(s).
params.name: textBlock

description:
Returns an array of strings. Each element in the array is a separate
paragraph.
